graph_prototype.name: FW dropped and rejected traffic on interface {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger.name: FW memory usage is more than 90%

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and ({Stonegate SNMP:fwMemBytesUsed.last()}/{Stonegate SNMP:fwMemBytesTotal.last()})>0.95) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and ({Stonegate SNMP:fwMemBytesUsed.last()}/{Stonegate SNMP:fwMemBytesTotal.last()})>0.93)
trigger.name: FW memory usage is more than 95%
